gameStates

Class GameStateManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameStates.GameStateManager

  • public class GameStateManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by nathaniel on 2/18/16. Manages the various game states in the game.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int CREDITSTATE 
      static javax.crypto.SecretKey key 
      static int MENUSTATE
      Index of the menu state in the list of game states kept by this class.
      static int WORLDSTATE
      Index of the forest state in the list of the game states kept by this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      GameStateManager(GamePanel gamePanel)
      Creates a new game state manager and begins with the menu state.
